name: Blue Dot!
description:
Blue Dot! is an simple game but with awesome new twist on it.
You will still avoid all wooden tiles on your way, but be careful sometimes they can move in different direction and be a little it harder to avoid them as they are on your way!

Easy to learn and difficult to put down. Download the Blue Dot! today and enter the zone.

How to play:
Playing Blue Dot! is simple. Touch And Drag To Move The Blue Dot!
Avoid the wooden tiles or your character will explode and the game will be over!
